title: madhurAmbA samrakSatu
sahitya:
madhurAmbA samrakSatu mAm shrI manu trikONa rUpiNI trilOcanI


anupallavi

 vEda vEdAnta tatva bOdhinI vidhi guruguha sammOdinI shrI dEvakriyA mOdinI daitya hantrI dIna rakSiNI


caraNam   himAcala kumArI sundarI hiraNya kuNDala shObhAkarI hAlAsyanAtha mana priyakarI hamsanAda vashamkarI shrIkari 
vAmAcAra priyakarI vashi nyAdyArAdhita varadAbhayakarI vAgvAdinyAdi mAtrkA sEvitAnanda kadamba kAdambarI
